meta.title: Sourcery for Developers
meta.description: Become a software development with our free of charge three-month academy, available this fall and spring. Work with our top specialists as your mentors and lecturers in Kaunas and Vilnius.

developersIntro.heading: Sourcery Academy for Developers
developersIntro.paragraph: Become a software development with our free of charge three-month academy, available this fall and spring. Work with our top specialists as your mentors and lecturers in Kaunas and Vilnius.

academyStepsSection.heading: Apply
academyStepsSection.paragraph: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional three-month course for the developer beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or group assignments.

academyStepsSection.heading: Pass the admission
academyStepsSection.paragraph: Registration is available for candidates who are willing to pass the entry exam. Results define a list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into the academy.

academyStepsSection.heading: Learn from the experts
academyStepsSection.paragraph: Students will learn the latest technologies and how to create software using the best tools on the market. Devbridge assigns a mentor to each student to serve as a resource for their development projects.

academyStepsSection.heading: Join the company
academyStepsSection.paragraph: At the end of term all students will receive recognition for completing the course and top students may receive job offers from Devbridge.

admissionSections.heading: Introduction
admissionSections.text: During your first lecture we will introduce the Sourcery academy, tell you more about what we do as developers, get to know your fellow team members, lecturers and mentors.

admissionSections.heading: An interview
admissionSections.text: Only the top candidates after the final exam are invited to a job interview which will challenge your technical skills and English knowledge.

apply.heading: Apply to academy
apply.paragraph: Entrance test results define a priority list of candidates. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.
